channel.title: CVE Feed for NVIDIA -- Jetson TX1 and TX2
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NVIDIA -- Jetson TX1 and TX2

item.title: CVE-2019-5672|2024-08-04T20:01:51.975Z -- nvidia -- jetson%20tx1%20and%20tx2
item.description: NVIDIA Jetson TX1 and TX2 contain a vulnerability in the Linux for Tegra (L4T) operating system (on all versions prior to R28.3) where the Secure Shell (SSH) keys provided in the sample rootfs are not replaced by unique host keys after sample rootsfs generation and flashing, which may lead to information disclosure.
